alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 12:14PM PST until November 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation below 3000 feet between 3 to 7 inches. Total snow accumulations above 3000 feet between 7 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Orin-Rice Road, Deer Park, Kettle Falls, Flowery Trail Road, Newport, Chewelah, Springdale-Hunters Road, Colville, and Northport. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Winter travel conditions are expected during the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
